homepage.title: Meet Jonathan!!
homepage.description: I am a Front-End Developer specialising in React solutions with 6 years experience working for clients across retail, banking and telecom sectors.

employment.message: From a small family run Software company, to multinational Consultancy firms and Digital Design agencies.

skills.message: Strong skillset in web based technologies and specialises in React solutions. Leadership skills in an Agile environment.

education.message: Born and raised in Northern Ireland, studied Architecture in Edinburgh and continues professional development to this day.

aboutSite.title: About this site
aboutSite.paragraph1: This site has been created to showcase my current skillset. Hopefully, this is conveyed from an end-userâ€™s perspective and through the underlying source code.
aboutSite.paragraph2: This site is built with React and Gatsby, to facilitate rapid development and blazing performance.
aboutSite.paragraph3: Please see links to the source code in the footer below, and feel free to drop me a message on LinkedIn if you would like to chat.
